summary: "Happy Birthday to You" is a famous song sung on birthdays. It's one of the most known songs in English and has been translated into many languages. The tune comes from an older song called "Good Morning to All," which was made by American sisters Patty and Mildred J. Hill. However, who actually created the melody is debated. This song is free to use in the U.S. and Europe, and a company had to pay back money they collected for its copyright.
title: Happy Birthday to You
